instruction: What metric was chosen to distinguish between ASD and TD, and how accurate was this metric in the related study to distinguish ASD from TD using a single optical channel?
Output: The metric chosen to distinguish between ASD and TD in the related study was the fluctuation entropy of functional near-infrared spectroscopy (fNIRS) time series. instruction: Can the use of a single optical channel in fNIRS spectroscopy provide complete feature information to accurately distinguish Autism spectrum disorder (ASD) from typically developing (TD) individuals, as demonstrated in the related study to distinguish ASD from TD using a single optical channel?
